project_descr: Support to Civil Service Reform in Ukraine

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is strengthening the civil service, improving policy coordination, rationalizing structures and functions of public institutions to fill in gaps and eliminate overlaps, ensuring effective public service delivery and a viable balance between national and sub-national levels of government, enhancing transparency and accountability  all these still remain to be on top of development agenda in Ukraine.

project_title: support to civil service reform in ukraine
